text:
@RahulGandhi #HelpSaveSmallBusinesses is the need of the hour, awesome initiative👍
Govt needs to help with Commercial Rent assistance, Biz Loans with lower/zero interest, Tax relief, wage subsidies, UBI for low income workers, daily wagers, resolve/transform supply chains to combat #Covid19
